      boolean addOnePoint(int player)
      Method used to add one point to the score for a player Use case: "tabe", most spades & most cards Returns true if game is over

      int playerPoints(int player) 
      void roundEnd()
      Checks who has most spades and cards which equals one point for both Also gives one extra point if a player wins both
      void valueCards(int player, java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
      A player send in hand to calculate all points from hand when round has ended
